scripts.scss: node-sass src/scss/main.scss --source-map-embed src/css/main.css && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.watch: npm run watch-js & npm run watch-scss
scripts.build-css: npm run scss && csso src/css/main.css dist/css/main.css
scripts.build-js: npm run js && uglifyjs src/js/main.js -mco dist/js/main.js
scripts.prebuild: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist dist/css dist/js dist/js/libs dist/js/workers
scripts.build: npm run build-html && npm run build-css && npm run build-js && npm run build-img && npm run build-lib && npm run build-worker
